name: Ninpop
description:
ninpop
Yoo Ninja is a fast and supper addictive game. It lead you enter a fantastic world without the control by the gravity.
As a Ninja you need go left and right to pop bouncing balls. Forward running is the only way to keep your life.
avoid being hit by any bouncing ball , collect prizes
Features:
- Simple but fun one touch arcade game
- very cool game , you need to defeat your friends score on Facebook
- Endless mode, enjoy the fun more
- 4 different worlds
- Fun ending

developed by SkoochApp
